title: Petition for Riot to Tweak Dawnchaser Sejuani's Splash Art
body:
**Splash Art:**
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hUs0r1pNzUI/WBeby7EBUSI/AAAAAAAA_hI/-9ReSOKjRmET6QAjX3WelYns16t6UPNPQCLcB/s1600/Sejuani_Splash_7.jpg

**Loading Screen Slice:**
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6k2Oq-hu4B4/WBece17oXEI/AAAAAAAAXJU/5tK8LBQ_CZ02Ui1eo16fEJ4vMEQ_KDQhACEw/s1600/Sejuani_7.jpg

I know Riot has a very talented art department and I never want to sound ungrateful but at the same time- I want (and those with me) to be heard about wanting Sejuani to get the right treatment. Before I start, let me show you a good splash of Sejuani- using Bear Cavalry Sejuani & Poro Rider for an example:

http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/Bear-Cavalry-Sejuani.jpg
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/sejuani_pororider_splash_1920.jpg?itok=htU2PJ9h

Although the skins are somewhat old, look at her expression ... they're _expressive_. She isn't bored or looking like she has no clue on how to fight, but rather ... ready for the dive. Lively, anticipating the thrill of a fight, brave, fearless, you get the picture. Not to mention the way her body is animated in both splashes makes her stand out like she did achieve taming a beast the size of a truck. Now, let's look at the latest two splashes of Sejuani with Beast Hunter and the upcoming skin Dawnchaser:

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ApjtgiSwtlw/Vp_ivMe4rqI/AAAAAAAA3HA/AEiJmyVi4P8/s1600/Tryndamere_Splash_8.jpg
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hUs0r1pNzUI/WBeby7EBUSI/AAAAAAAA_hI/-9ReSOKjRmET6QAjX3WelYns16t6UPNPQCLcB/s1600/Sejuani_Splash_7.jpg

Notice how she isn't like her character in game ... just bored, or lacking the interest to fight. In Beast Hunter, she's really small in the background with a 'let's just get this over with' expression and no personality. Even when zooming in, the  quality of her splash dropped regardless. In the upcoming Dawnchaser skin, she doesn't seem into it whatsoever, and again the quality of her splash is quite poor. I don't demand for Riot to change the splash completely and have her like ... up front; blocking the view of the other two champions.

All I want is for them to change her face / expression. Make her look like a warrior ready to strike at the heart of her foes. Make Sejuani what she's known for: Someone who enjoys diving the enemy lines and beating the living daylights out of them. Have her splash also cleaner because her face is also blurred. I know this is an alternative version of Sejuani but I want Riot to deliver justice for her and make the girl stand out. Last 2 splashes, and people are disappointed ... it especially hurts because Dawnchaser's in-game model is quite good. I just want the splash to reflect how good her model is too.

> [{quoted}](name=Hyper Stan,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=j9K8dLEg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-01T18:06:01.665+0000)
>
> I fully support this notion, the splash itself is cool, but Sejuani's face doesnt make it look as if shes into it.

That's what really troubles me overall about the splash. I'm the kind of League player who looks into the lore of every champion I enjoy playing. While I understand that skins are alternative versions / personas of said champion, their characteristics usually still apply.

{{champion:113}} embraces pain, thinks of it as power, and thrives on becoming stronger due to the harsh pain she's endured. I mean, she lost her siblings to the cold and starved for many nights ... she'd walk in blizzards with no fur or food until she nearly collapsed. Sejuani is the kind of tribe leader that wouldn't back down, whom dominates with pride. The last two splash arts (Beast Hunter & Dawnchaser) totally ignore her persona and make Sejuani into a mere bodyguard with no thrill for fighting. It goes against her character greatly.

_"Show them our teeth."_ ~ Sejuani

Yet in this splash she doesn't even look like she has any experience in fighting lol. It pains me too, because the in-game model is quite awesome apart from the Lion being kind of fat which I can live with. What I hope for however, is Riot heeding to our wishes and making Sejuani in this splash the girl we came to know and love ... a fearless warrior seeking to beat down anyone who opposes her. I want to see it in the face, and see her look animated.

I was really in love when I saw this sej's ingame model and I'm not even a Sejuani player. It looks great and has the entire "rpg" elf thing going for it which is a bonus. However, I have to agree that her splash art, and particularly the zoomed in version, do not do the model any justice.

The Lion is barely visible, Jayce is way too present in her loading slice, and her face... her face looks terrible. She looks like a mouthbreather, her eyes are super weird, there is no real background "scene" like in many other shared splasharts, and it looks like too many filters were applied in a haphazard slapdash sort of way. Like Sej's was the splash they had to do in a hurry. 

I really hope the skins team goes over it again because I really love this skin otherwise. Please just do us all a favor and give her a proper face!
